ygData.subject: Re: Hunting ground
ygData.msgSnippet: Perma can be darnd dangerous. Especially with corpse recover trains, they are the worst. I call tell you the loot is steady if uninspireing so far. At 22nd
ygData.messageBody:
Perma can be darnd dangerous. Especially with corpse recover trains, they
are the worst. I call tell you the loot is steady if uninspireing so far. At
22nd level I have seen 1 white Gob give up the only peice of bronze (and the
only one I did not want a collar) and he had a FS simitar on top of that.
Had to be a 25-30 plat Gob. Otherwise it is runes, words, and bronze weapons
with the occasional plat thrown in.

Kailyn


>From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>

>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Hunting ground

>From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>

>The big man himself Brad McQuaid plays in Permafrost. The zone that items
>are constantly being added to. Suspect anything. Anyway, if it's good
>enough for Brad, chances are it's a very good zone.
>
>Kindrael
